treatment: type:'randomized controlled trial' title:randomized abstract:randomized title:placebo abstract:placebo
diagnosis: title:sensitiv* abstract:sensitiv* mesh:'sensitivity and specificity' +(title:predictive abstract:predictive) +(title:value* abstract:value*) mesh:'predictive value of tests' title:accuracy* abstract:accuracy
prognosis: kwd:prognosis title:diagnosed abstract:diagnosed title:cohort* abstract:cohort* kwd:'cohort effect' kwd:'cohort studies' title:predictor* abstract:predictor* title:death abstract:death kwd:'models, statistical'
etiology: title:risk abstract:risk kwd:risk title:mortality abstract:mortality kwd:mortality title:cohort abstract:cohort
review: article-type:'meta analysis' article-type:review title:'meta analysis' abstract:'meta analysis' kwd:'meta analysis' title:search* abstract:search*
